results.name: Array a(m,n) = pi(m+n) - pi(m) - pi(n) read by antidiagonals, where pi() = A000720 (m,n >= 0).
comment: A212210-A212213 are the preferred versions of this array.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
